summary: Adds a sanctuary, objective/quest and a player home to obtain north west of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#C00000][I][B]________________________________Description___________________________________________[/B][/I][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B]- This mod adds a sanctuary (also a quest) that has been overrun by a rogue necromancer clan that aims to resurrect the Wolf Queen named Potema, many in Whiterun say that they hear cracking sounds coming from the north west. The necromancers have added an enchantment over the cave that prevents any followers from entering. Some brave adventurers have explored closer to these sounds but they never returned. The people of Whiterun now call the Dragonborn to venture towards these mysterious sounds and discover who, or what, stirs within. If you defeat the clan and their bodyguards, Dova can use the inside of the ancient tree stump as a player home. [/B]
[COLOR=#FFFF00][SIZE=4][B]ALL CREDITS FOR QUEST SCRIPTS AND QUEST GO TO 6DOMINO6, WITHOUT HER, NO QUEST![/B][/SIZE][/COLOR]
The quest start is in whiterun pinned up to a wooden pillar on the blacksmiths shop
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13501]CHECK OUT HER MODS![/URL]
[URL=http://www.youtube.com/v/oRoGlJqdH9A][[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[[The video is here!]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]]][/URL]

[B]This is my second mod, so constructive criticism please. Also notify me of any improvements/suggestions or bugs that you discover, thanks in advance![/B]
[SIZE=4][I][COLOR=#C00000][B]________________________________Installation________________________________________________[/B][/I][/COLOR]   [/SIZE]                          [B]- - Simply just put .esp and \"scripts\" folder into the Skyrim /Data folder and check it. ??? Profit![/B]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#C00000][I][B]_______________________________Known bugs____________________________________________[/B][/I][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B]- Ritual master npc sometimes bugs out and starts running against walls and tables.[/B]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#C00000][I][B]__________________________Recommended Mods__________________________________________[/B][/I][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[B]- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4082]Better Butterflies - More Colourful Butterflies[/URL]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12798]Crimson Tide - Blood[/URL]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1702]Immersive Skyrim Thunder V5 - Immersive Skyrim Thunder V5[/URL]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/URL]
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3812]TreesHD_Skyrim_variation_HIGH_NEW[/URL] (THIS IS A VERY IMPORTANT ONE AS THE TREE STUMP HAS BEEN UPSCALED ALOT)
- [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13268]W.A.T.E.R[/URL][/B]
[SIZE=4][COLOR=#C00000][I][B]_____________________________________NOTES_________________________________________[/B][/I][/COLOR][/SIZE]
The quest is here!
[B][U]HARDCORE DIFFICULTY VERSION NOW UP![/U][/B]
[COLOR=#00B050][B][SIZE=5]ONLY DOWNLOAD THIS MOD IF YOU ALREADY HAVE COMPLETED OR DON\'T MIND MISSING OUT ON THE QUEST \"Moss Mother Cavern\", GIVEN BY VALDR![/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Moss_Mother_Cavern_(quest)][B][COLOR=#00B050]HERE\'S A LINK TO THE QUEST[/COLOR][/B][/URL]
